pr_title: LDAPC: Support for Vo/Group attribute event processing

timeline.message:
LDAPC: Support for Vo/Group attribute event processing

- There was missing attribute event processing logic for
  Vo and Group entities.
- Initial sync including attributes is now supported too.

timeline.bodyText: Is there any reason to use Iterable instead of List? The same question for all other uses.
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: Not really, its just more generic than List and is aligned with the implementation for other entities. Technically, we could convert all those methods in interfaces to the List but like this we can pass Sets or Queues or whatever of Attributes without needing new or modifying existing methods.
replies.author: zlamalp
